Poetry: Kisi ke haath bikne ko tayyar nahi
Ye mera dil hay koi misar ka bazaar nahi
Main tujhko mohabbat main sahoolat se rakhoonga
To mujh se mulaaqaat main waqfa na diya ker
Pehna ker loog libaas aitibaar-o-mohabbat ka
Phir gharz-o-munafqat se daagdaar kertay hain
Duaa kisi ko dilaati hay takht-o-taaj magar
Kisi ki aah bhi hukoomat cheen layti hay
Mansoob teri zaat se ranaiyaan tamam
Teray bina hayaat main koi dilkashi nahi
Gham-e-zindagi tujhay kiya kahon
Bus zindagi hi to muhaal hay
Jahan maut itni asaan thi
Wahin ji liya to kamal hay!
Teri aankhon ki kashish kaisay tujhay samajhaon
In charaghon ne meri neend urda rakhi hay!!!
Dil tumhara hi hay, hamaisha hi tumhara hoga
Koon kehta hay, mujhay ishq doobara hoga!
Reza reza kerkay bakhair daiti hay
Be parwah logon se be panah mohabbat
Baat ker laitay hain shayed koi hal mil jay
Aaj mushkil hay to kahna mujhay kul mil jay
Ain mumkin hay woh ik rooz mujhay kerlay qabool
Ain mumkin hay mujhay sabar ka phal mil jay!
Bohat sooch ker soocha hay kinarah ker liya jay
Faqaq teri yadoon per guzara ker liya jay
Aik woh bhi waqt that jub ajnabi thay dono
Wohi haal ab ke phir dobara ker liya jay
Gham-e-zindagi tujhay kiya kahon
Bus zindagi hi to muhaal hay
Jahan maut itni asaan thi
Wahin ji liya to kamal hay!
Baat ker laitay hain shayed koi hal mil jay
Aaj mushkil hay to kahna mujhay kul mil jay
Ain mumkin hay woh ik rooz mujhay kerlay qabool
Ain mumkin hay mujhay sabar ka phal mil jay!
Dil ki hasrat zuban pe aanay lagi
To nay daikha aur zindagi muskuranay lagi
Ye ishq ki intiha thi ya dewangi meri
Har soorat main teri soorat nazar anay lagi
Ye rang chehray ke, aur khuwaab apni aankhon ke
Hawa chalay koi aisi, bikhar na jain kahin
Jhalak raha hay jin aankhon se ab wajood mera
Ye aankhain, haye ye aankhain, mukar na jain kahin!!!
Ae tabeeb, yoon koshish na ker
Tujhay kiya khabar meray merz ki?
Pehlay ishq ker…phir chaut kha….
Phir likh dawa meray dard ki!!!
Ik samundar hay jo meray qabo main hay
Aur ik qatra hay jo mujhse sanbhala nahi jata
Ik umar hay jo beetani hay uske baghair
Aur ik lamha hay jo mujhse guzara nahi jata
Tujh se ishq hogiya ab khasara kaisa
Darya-e-ishq main jo utar gye ab kinara kaisa
Ik bar jo teray hogye tu bus hogye
Rooz kerna naya istakhara kaisa!!!
Mujhay hi kiyon khiyaal ata hay ke
Kisi ko bura na lag jay
Kisi ko ye khiyaal kiyon nahi ata
Ke mujhay bhi bura lag sakta hay
Wehshat ne zindagi ki rawani ujaard di
Ik waqia ne sari kahani ujaard di
Kamsin badan pe boojh hay boordhay dimaag ka
Sanjeedgi ne meri jawani ujaard di
Tujh ko chahoon andaaz badal badal ke
Meri zindagi ka akloota ishq ho tum
Uske hasil honey ki qeemat tum kiya jano?
Woh meri tahajjud main maangi gyee dua hay.
Apni zaat ka sadqa dena perday ga mujhay
Aaj kisi ne barday ghaur se daikha mujhay!
Ye kaisay mumkin hay hal nikal jaey dil ki weraani ka
Aakhir woh shakhs mera ishq hay aur ishq bhi ain jawani ka!
Hum se be wafai ki hud poochtay ho
Woh mujh se ishq seekhta raha kisi aur ke liye!!!
Nahi hota kisi tabeeb se is merz ka ilaaj Wasi
Ishq la ilaaj hay, bus perhaiz kijye
Ye aena kiya de ga tumhain, tumhari shakhsiyyat ki khabar
Kabhi meri  aankhon se daikho, kitne lajawab ho tum
Ye jo pagal hotay hain yehi tu mukhlis hotay hain
Kabhi daikha hay kisi samajhdar ko ishq kertay howay!
Manta hon tujhay ishq nahi mujh se,Lakin as weham se ab koon nikalay mujhko?
Mohabbat sabar ke siwa kuch nahiMain nay her ishq ko intizaar kertay daikha hay
Usay kehna…
Jahan hum ne bichartay
Waqt likha tha…
Koi rut ho, koi
Mausam…
Mohabbat mer nahi sakti…
Wahan per likh giya koi…
Taluq khuwah kaisa ho, bilaakhir
Toot jata hay!
Tabbiyat bhar hi jati
hay…
Koi manay na manay, per
Mohabbat mer hi jati hay!
Hud se be hud!
Meri aik hud hay,
Aur tum usme be hud ho
Main alif hoon
Aur tum uski med ho!
Daikho to kahin bhi nahi
Sochoon to kuch bhi nahi
Magar…
Jo keh doon!
To tum meray hone ki sanad ho.
Meri aik hud hay!
Aur tum usme be hud ho.
Kabhi laut aa meray charah ger
Meray rahnuma, meray baakhabar
Mera lafz lafz hay muztarab
Mera sher sher udaas hay
Meray kaafiyay ko kami teri
Hay radeef ko teri aarzo
Mujhay shaeri ki zubaan main
Teray saath kerni hay guftugu
Meray chara gar, meray baakhabar
Meri baat sun abhi laut
Woh shakhs mujhay piyara hay usay kehna
Meray jeenay ka sahara hay usay kehna
loog bohat se piyaray hain mujhko
magar woh sub se piyara hay usay kehna
Mohabbatain, shikayetain, adawatain uski
Mujhay sub gawara hay usay kehna
Chahne walay aur bhi hain lekin
Mujhay sirf intizaar tumhara hay usay kehna
Tujhse Moo Kis Tarah Modta..
Pyaar Tera Meri Aur Tha..
Gair Samjha Mujhe Umr Bhar..
Uska Bhi Ek Ajab Daur Tha..
Tujh Ko De Kar Ke Khushiya Sabhi..
Gham Ki Chadar Ko Me Audta..
Ho Na Jaye Kahi Be-Rukhi..
Kis Tarah Me Zuba Kholta..
Teri Yaade Hai Is Shahr Me..
Ye Shahr Kaise Me Chodta..
Dekha Sameer Ne Raat Bhar..
Wo Meri Basti Ka Chor Tha..
Submitted By: Shaikh Sameer
Koi Aisa Kamaal Ho Jaye..
Husn Ka Inteqaal Ho Jaye..
Is Tarah Se Na Dekh Tu Mujh Ko..
Mera Jeena Muhaal Ho Jaye..
Sochta Hu Me Jo Har Ek Lamha..
Kaash Tera Khyaal Ho Jaye..
Tere Aane Ki Khabar Sunte Hi..
Shahr-E-Dil Me Dhamaal Ho Jaye..
Dekh Kar Hasna Yun Diwaane Ko..
Shayad Tera Ye Haal Ho Jaye..
Dhundta Me Phiru Jise Sameer..
Koi To Ek Sawaal Ho Jaye..!!!
Submited By: Shaikh Sameer
Mujhay justujo-e-ishq hay
Teri qurbaton ka sawal hay
Main hoon ishq se na aashna
Meray dooston ka khiyal hay
Meri qalam hay gawah is per
Meri shaeri bhi daleel hay
Ye ajeeb khail hay ishq ka
Main ne aap daikha hay ye moajza
Woh jo lafz meray guman main thay
Woh teri zuban per a gye
Meri umar se na simat sakay
Meray dil main itne sawal thay
Teray paas jitnay jawab thay
Teri ik nigah main a gye
Galay lug ker koi roye
Nadamat ho to aisi ho
Yehi mehsoos ho jaisay
Kai sadiyaan guzri hain
Faqat ik pal ki furqat main
Aziyyat ho to aisi ho
Mujhay kaanta chubhe aur
Uski aankhon se laho tapke
Taluq ho to aisa ho
Mohabbat ho to aisi ho
Hijar ka taara doob chala hai dhalne lagi hai raat wasi
Qatra qatra baras rahi hai ashkon ki barsaat wasi
Tere bad ye duniya wale mujh ko pagal kar den gay
Khushbo k dais men mujh ko le chal apne sath wasi
Yun hi chup ki mohar laga kar kb tak ghum sum betho gay
Khamoshi se dam ghut_ta hai cherro koi bat wasi
Aj to us ka chehra bhi kuch badla badla lagta hai
Mosam badla, duniya badli, badl gay haalat wasi
Mere ghar khushiyon ka ye raqs usi k dam se hai
Us k sath chali jay gi pholoon ki baraat wasi
Chor wasi ab us ki yaden tujh ko pagal kar den gi
Tu qatra hai wo darya hai dekh apni auqaat wasi
Bana ker choord daitay hain apni zaat ka aadi
kuch laug yoon bhi intiqaam laitay hain
Mujh ko siyah rang se ulfat bala ki thi
Phir yon howa ke bakht main siyahi bikhar gye
Bohat be kaif lamhe hain ajeeb bojhal tabiyyat hay
Na gham se dil behalta hay na khushiyaan raas aati hain
Tu ne daikha hay mahaz mujhay khush bahar se
Meray andar ki cheekhain tera dil phaard sakti hain
Udaas to bohat rahay per kabhi zaahir nahi kiya
Theek hoon bas is lafz ne sub sanbhaal liya
Lazzat gham-e-ishq ka tum kiya jano
Main khush raha dil ko barbaad kerkay
Hum itne bhi nahi badlay ke bhool jain apnon ko
Magar jub koi muntazir hi na ho to raabte achay nahi lagtay
Is qadar boojh hay neendon ka meri aankhon per
Main ne thak haar ker sona nahi mer jana hay!
Mujhay choord ker woh jis shakhs ke paas gaya hay
Meri barabari ka hota to bhi dil ko sabar aa jata!
Woh itna qareeb ho giya tha
Mujhay laga mera ho giya tha!
Teri aankhon ki kashish kaisay tujhay samajhaon
In charaghon ne meri neend urda rakhi hay!!!
Teri maasoom nigaahon ke taqaddus ki qasam
Dil ne tu kiya rooh ne bhi tujh se mohabbat ki hay
Aa daikh meri aankh ke bheegay howe mausam
Ye kis ne keh diya ke tujhay bhool gyee hum!
Ye jo doobi hain meri aankhain ashkon ke darya main
Ye matti ke insaano per bharosay ki saza hay
Isi umeed pe aankhon main jhankta hon main
Kahin mil jay woh samundar jo mujhko lay doobay
Us ki dard bhari aankhoon ne jis jaga kaha tha alwida
Aaj bhi waheen khara hay dil uske aane ke intizar main
Tumhari ik nigah se qatal ho jatay hain loog
Ik nazar hum ko bhi daikho ke zindagi achi nahi lagti
Un ki aankhoon main nazar aata hay sara jahan mujhko
Afsoos ke un ki aankhon main kabhi khud ko nahi daikha
Kisi din bitha ke pochain gay teri ankhon se
Kis ne sikhaya hay inhain her dil main utar jana
Kiya kashish thi us ki aankhon main mut pocho
Mujh se mera dil lar para mujhay woh shakhs chahyeah
Gir pardi hoon teri khatir main
Zameen ki khaak ban ker yun
Uthna na chahoon phir sey main
Teray liyay girna muqaddas samjhoon
Submitted by: Komal yousuf
Ginti To Nahi Yaad Magar Yaad Hai Itna
Sub Zakhm Baharon K Zamany Me Lage Hain…
Koi To Aisa Ho Jis Ko Kahun Tu Mera Ban
Koi To Aye K Dil Se Teri Kami Nikle…
Kon Se Dukh Ki Karen Bat K Dil Ka Darya
Itni Tughyani Ki Zad Par Hai K Kuch Yad Nahi…
Afatain Mere Ta’aqub Me Hi Kiun Rehti Hain
Me Kisi Ka Bhi Bura Chahne Wala To Nahi…
Submitted By: Rashid Qayoum Ansar
Milne Ata Hai Roz Gham Mujh Se
Us Ne Dekha Hua Hai Ghar Mera…
Submitted By: Rashid Qayoum Ansar
Dekh Kin Marhalon Se Guzri Hai
Zindagi Dagh Dagh Hone Tak…
Submitted By: Rashid Qayoum Ansar
Tumhare Bad Kya Rakhna Anaa Se Wasta Koi
Tum Apne Sath Mera Umer Bhar Ka Maan Le Jana…
Khaak Ko Chot Agar Khaak Se Lag Sakti Hai
Mun Pe Darya K Bhi Ansu Koi Mara Jaye…
Yoon Tera Paas Se Guzar Jana
Umer Ki Be-Rukhi Ka Hasil Hai…
Uski aankhon main rakhi theen barkatain rub ne!
Us haseen shakhs se wajib tha mohabbat kerna!
Itna bhi kiya kisi ki mohabbat main gharaq hona
Bus theek hay koi tha! magar ab nahi raha
Iski khuwahish hay ke main perday main rahoon
Woh aik shakhs jo meri haya pe marta hay
Poochtay hain loog mujh se mera kiya lagta hay woh
Koi neki thi meri jiska sila lagta hay woh!!!
Mohabbat aik khushbu hay jo hamaisha saath chalti hay
Koi insaan tanhai main bhi tanha nahi rehta
Teri maasoom nigaahon ke taqaddus ki qasam
Dil ne tu kiya rooh ne bhi tujh se mohabbat ki hay
Woh mujhay pukaarta hay alag alag namon se
magar jub JAAN kehta hay walAllah  jaan le leta hay!
Koi sikhae mohabbat ke tareeqay usko
Khat ke ghusse main kabootar nahi maray jatay
Khamoosh baithay hain to loog kehtay hain udasi achi nahi
Zara sa huns lain to loog muskurane ki waja pooch laytay hain
Phir kisi yaad ne, raat bhar hai jagaya mujh ko
Kiya saza di hai, mohabat ne khudaya mujh ko
Din ko aaram hai na, raat ko hai chain kabhi
Jane kis khaak se, qudrat ne banaya mujh ko
Dukh to yeh hai ke, zamane main milay ghair sabhi
Jo mila hai, woh mila ban ke, paraya mujh ko
Jab koi bhi na raha kandha, mere rone ko
Ghar ki deewaron ne, seene se lagaya mujh ko
Uoon to umeed-e-wafa, tum se nahi hai koi
Phir charaghon ki tarah, kis ne jalaya mujh ko
Meri tabahiyon main tera haath hay
Lakin hum sub se keh rahay hain muqaddar ki baat hay!
Kub ka chor diya hum ne logon per yaqeen kerna
Mohabbat se jo bhi mila berbaad ker giya
Meri nakamiyon per tum zara tashweesh mut kerna
Jisay kuch bhi nahi ata, mohabbat us ko ati hay
Bara ajeeb qissa hay ke meray dil ne
Apne mufaad ki khatir mujhay berbad ker dala
Main bhi kitna ajeeb hoon itna ajeeb hoon ke bus
Khud ko tabah kerliya aur malaal bhi nahi
Tujh ko khabar nahi magar aik baat sunlo
Barbaad ker diya tere do din ke ishq ne mujhay
Dil main rah ker dil dukahte ho
Apna muqaam dekho aur apne kaam dekho
Gilay kagaz ki tarha tahri zindagi apni
Koi likhta bhi nahi koi jalata bhi nahi
Dil ko teri yaad ki aadat hai mustaqil
Ab youn karo ke meri aadat ko cheen lo
Main to awara hoon bad naam hoon zamane main mager
Tum log to muqaddas ho phir wafa kiyoun nahi karte
Main tujhay ta-umar yaad aoon
Bhoolne waley teri saza ho ye!
Hum bhi khamoosh reh ker tujh ko aazmaingay
Daikhtay hain ab hum tujhko kub yaad aaingay
Apne guzre howe ayam se nafrat hay mujhayApni be kar tamannaon pe sharminda hon main
Is tarah yaad aa ker be chain na kiya keroAik ye hi saza kafi hay ke pass nahi ho tum
Aa daikh meri aankh ke bheegay howe mausam
Ye kis ne keh diya ke tujhay bhool gyee hum!
Shaam hotay hi charaagon ko bujha daita hoon
Dil hi kaafi hay teri yaad main jalne ke liyay
Abhi tuk yaad ker rahay ho, pagal ho tum qasam se
Us ne to teray baad bhi, hazaroon bhula diyay
Abhi tuk yaad ker rahay ho pagal ho tum qasam se
Us ne tu teray baad bhi hazaroon bhula diyay
Kabhi khamoosh baitho gay kabhi kuch gungunao gay
Main itna yaad aoon gi, mujhay jitna bhulao gay
Bhula dain gay tum ko bhi zara sabar tu kero
Rug rug main basay ho thorda waqt tu lagay ga
Naraz tum naraz hum kaisay mitain phir ye duriya
Hum muntazir tum bay khaber dono ki hain majboriyan
Bohat qareeb sey anjaan ban ke guzra hay
Woh jo dur say pehchan liya kerta tha
Ab To Yoon Hai K Tere Hijar Main Rony K Liye
Aankh Me Khoon To Kya Khoon Sa Pani Bhi Nahi…
Ishq Jis Se Bhi Karo Yad Ye Rakhna Aye Dost
Chor Jate Hain Parindy Bhi Shajar Ko Ek Roz…
Submitted By: Aamir Fareed
Ab Meri Raah Main Haayal Nahi Hoti Yaadein
Ab Tere Sheher Se Guzrun To Guzar Jati Hun…
Tumhare Samny Tum Se Nazar Chura Kar Hum
Zara Sa Door Se Palty To Gumaan Kesa
Tumhe Yaqeen To Thehra Ka Ye Mohabbat Hai
Mere Khayal Main Mushkil Hai Imtahan Aisa…
Na Shikwa Tha Lubon Par Na Honton Se Lahu Tapka
Bus Ek Lamha Judai Ka Atak Kar Reh Gaya Dil Me…
Us Waqt Tere Dil Main Bohat Dard Uthe Ga
Jab Mujh Se Bichar Kar Mere Humnaam Milenge…
Sari Yaadein Sambhal Kar Rakhna
Hum Na Honge To Kam Aengi…
Log Jo Door Jaa Chuke Hain Bohat
Un Ki Yaadein Hain Mere Pas Abhi…
Woh na milay to kiya howa yeh ishq hai haves nahi
Main unhi ka tha unhi ka hoon woh mere nahi to na sahi
Usay shaq hai ke hum un ke liye jaan nahi de sakty
Mujhy khof hai ke roye gey woh bohaut hamey azmany key bad
Meri mohabbatain bhi ajeeb theen mera faiz bhi tha kamal per
Kabhi sub kuch mila bina talab kabhi kuch na mila sawal per
Ek Main Hi Nahi Duniya Ujri Hai Meri
Shararton Se Tanhai Ka Safar Yun Tay Nahi Hua…
Rehte Hain Gharq Un K Tasawur Main Shab-O-Roz
Ek Din Humari Jaan Mohabbat Main Jaye Gi…
Ye Bargah-E-Ishq Hai Koi Khanqah Nahi
Yahan Phool Nahi Sar Charhaye Jate Hain…
Kon Se Dukh Ki Karen Bat K Dil Ka Darya
Itni Tughyani Ki Zad Par Hai K Kuch Yad Nahi…
Chal Chor De Ye Jazbaat Saqi
Ab Badal Gaye Halaat Saqi
Tu Jane Kya Kuch Sochta Tha
Ab Samjha Apni Okat Saqi
Ye Ishq Awaara Panchi Hai
Nahi Is Ki Koi Zaat Saqi
Jis Par Tha Mujhe Aitbaar Bohat
Wo Chor Gaya Mera Hath Saqi
Na Jane Kab Tak Tarpaye Ga
Tu Har Pal, Har Din Raat Saqi
Dil Khoon K Aansoo Rota Hai
Nahi Karta Jab Tu Baat Saqi…
Submitted By: Umer Hayat Saqi
Afatain Mere Ta’aqub Me Hi Kiun Rehti Hain
Me Kisi Ka Bhi Bura Chahne Wala To Nahi…

Submited By: Shaikh Sameer
Nahi howa mujhay naseeb piyar kisi ka
Phir main kiyon keron atibaar kisi ka
Ae waqt tu bhi zara thahar ja
Meri aankhon ko bhi hay intizaar kisi ka
Sari dunya rooth jay koi ghum nahi
Jeetay ji na juda ho dildar kisi ka
Kiya poochtay ho kahani meri mohabbat ki
Chaltay chaltay ker liya tha main ne bhi aetibar kisi ka
Yonhi ranjishon main guzar gai
Kabhi woh khafa, kabhi main khafa
Chahtoon ke mor per
Kabhi woh ruka, kabhi main ruka
Wohi raaste, wohi manzilain
Na usay khabar, na mujhay pata
Bus apni apni ana main gum
Kabhi wo juda, kabhi  main juda…
Phir kisi yaad ne, raat bhar hai jagaya mujh ko
Kiya saza di hai, mohabat ne khudaya mujh ko
Din ko aaram hai na, raat ko hai chain kabhi
Jane kis khaak se, qudrat ne banaya mujh ko
Dukh to yeh hai ke, zamane main milay ghair sabhi
Jo mila hai, woh mila ban ke, paraya mujh ko
Jab koi bhi na raha kandha, mere rone ko
Ghar ki deewaron ne, seene se lagaya mujh ko
Uoon to umeed-e-wafa, tum se nahi hai koi
Phir charaghon ki tarah, kis ne jalaya mujh ko
Us ne husan ki tareef maangi thi mujh se
Main ne usay aaina dikha diya!!
Teray chehre ke naqsh aise hain
Nazar uthata hoon, bhatak jata hoon
Mohabbat kay jaal main phansa ker
Pholoun sey mara gya mujhy
Ho na jay husan ki shan main gustakhi kahin
Tum chalay jao ke tumhain daikh ker piyar ata hay
Khuda janay konsi kasar reh gyee usay chahney main
Ke wo jaan hi na paee ke meri jaan hay wo
Zindagi youn bhi kum hai mohabbat ke liye
Youn routh ke waqt ganwane ki zarorat kiya hai
Firdos ki hoorain bhi kiya kamal hon gi Nazir
Per ye dil-e-kafir dunya ki hooron sey bhara kub hey
Le de ke wohi shakhs hai is sheher mein apna
Duniya Kahin usko bhi samajhdaar na kar de
Perwa nahi agr ye zamana khafa rahay
Momin dua ye maang, khuda maherban rahay
Guzri howi zindagi ko kabhi yaad na kr
Taqdeer main jo nahi likha uski faryad na kr
Jo ho ga woh ho kr hi rahy ga
To kal ki fiqar main aaj ki hansi burbad na kr
Bohat nayaab ho gye ho tum…!!!
Ab zakhmon per namak chirakne nahi aate ho
Alwida ae gham-e-yaar teri jaan chord di hum ne
Likh ker aaj khud ko be wafa qalam tor di hum ne
Badla howa hay aj meray aansuon ka rung
Kiya dil ke zakham ka koi tanka udhard giya hay
Ik meri he yaad se perhaiz hay tumko
Na janey kis hakeem se dawa letay ho
Hans hans ke wo kertay hain meray piyar ki toheen
Main kehta hoon mer jaoon ga wo kehtey hain ameen!!
Naseeb achchay na hon to khobsorti ka kiya faida
Dilon kay shahanshah aksar faqeer howa kartay hain
Mera zarf samjho ya meri zaat ka perda
Jub se tota hoon khamoosh rehta hoon
Jurdtay howey dekha nahi tootay howay dil ko
Gir jaen jo aanso tu uthaey nahi jatey
Patton ki tarah mujh ko bikhairta tha zamana
Ik shakhs ney yekja kiya or aag laga di
Ab tu awaz bhi do ge tu nahin aaen ge
Totney walay qiyamat ki anaa rakhtey hein
Bohat sooch ker soocha hay kinarah ker liya jay
Faqaq teri yadoon per guzara ker liya jay
Aik woh bhi waqt that jub ajnabi thay dono
Wohi haal ab ke phir dobara ker liya jay
Tujhay kiya lagta hay mujhay teri yaad nahi aati
Pagal koi apni barbaadi ko bhi bhool sakta hay
Dhaaga bhi darakht per baandh ker daikha
Sookh giya darakht magar woh mera na hosaka
Tum ne apni aadat laga ker choord diya akaila mujhay aur
Main teri aadat ka qaidi raat bhar soo nahi sakta
Zid pe ajaoon to mur ker bhi na daikhon!
Tum ne daikha hi nahi mera pathar hona
Kis qadar azziyyat hay zara soocho tu
Jis ne milna hi nahi uski tammanna kerna
Ab is ke baad koi raabta na hoga
Ye baat taeh hay magar sawaal dard ka hay!
Abhi umeed baaqi hay ke bicharda howa ik shakhs
Kisi bhi moor pe aaker mujhay hairaan kerdayga!
Kisi ke pass hay woh saray ka sara
Meray pass bus aik tasweer hay uski!
Roh main shamil hay faqat nus nus main nahi
Woh ik shakhs jo meri – dastaras main nahi!
Hum itne bhi nahi badlay ke bhool jain apnon ko
Magar jub koi muntazir hi na ho to raabte achay nahi lagtay
Is qadar boojh hay neendon ka meri aankhon per
Main ne thak haar ker sona nahi mer jana hay!
Mujhay choord ker woh jis shakhs ke paas gaya hay
Meri barabari ka hota to bhi dil ko sabar aa jata!
Woh itna qareeb ho giya tha
Mujhay laga mera ho giya tha!
Kisi ke haath bikne ko tayyar nahi
Ye mera dil hay koi misar ka bazaar nahi
Tum jang nahi thay ke jeet laitay tujhay
Hum tujhay haaray hain be intiha mohabbat kerke
Pehna ker loog libaas aitibaar-o-mohabbat ka
Phir gharz-o-munafqat se daagdaar kertay hain
Milne ka waada to unke mun se nikal gaya
Poochi jaga to kaha khuwaboon main ajana
Koi to ho jo ghabraie meri khamooshi se
Kisi ko to samajh aye meray lehjay ka dukh
Aisa haqeeqaton se tasadum howa ke phir
Main to bach gye magar meray khuwaab mur gye!
Aao kuch dair meri chahat ki chaoon main araam kerlo
Thuk gye hogay na mujh se nafrat kerte kerte??
Mujhay chahte hoon gay aur bhi bohat loog
Magar mujhay mohabbat apni mohabbat se hay
Humare baad nahi ayee ga usay chahat ka aisa maza
Woh ooroon se khud kehta phiray ga mujhay chaho uski tarah
Chahat, fikar, ehtiram, saadgi aur wafa
Meri inhi aadaton ne mera tamasha bana diya
Koi thukra de chahat ko tu huns ker seh lena
Mohabbat ki tabbiyat main zabardasti nahi hoti
Hum ne aik umar ganwadi tumhari chahat main
Kitne khush hongay tujhay muft main panay walay
Aik jhalak daikhna he ab kafi nahi
Tu mujhey rubaru, hobahu, jabaja chahyeah
Itna tu kisi ne chaha bhi na hoga
Jitna main ne sirf soocha hay tujhey
Hum tu muhabbat ke naam se bhi anjaan thay
Aik shakhs ki chahat ne humain paagal bana diya
Itni dilkash thi kahan ye zindagi
Hum ne jub tuk aap ko chaha na tha

Dil main rah ker dil dukahte ho
Apna muqaam dekho aur apne kaam dekho
Gilay kagaz ki tarha tahri zindagi apni
Koi likhta bhi nahi koi jalata bhi nahi
Jahan se tera je chahy mrei kutb-e-zindagi parth le
Safa chahy koi bhi khule naam tere hi likha hoga
Mana ke hum hain ujray howe shaher ki misaal
Ankhain bta rahi hain ke weran tum bhi ho
Meray bus main agar hota, hata ker chaand taroon ko
Main saray aasman per bus tera naam likh daita
Meri zindagi bhi is qabristaan ki tarah hay
Jahan loog tu bohat hain magar apna koi nahi
Phir kahin bhi panah nahi milti
Mohabbat jub be panah ho jaay
Aa daikh meri aankh ke bheegay howe mausam
Ye kis ne keh diya ke tujhay bhool gyee hum!
Shaam hotay hi charaagon ko bujha daita hoon
Dil hi kaafi hay teri yaad main jalne ke liyay
Tumhara dabdaba loogon yahan sirf zindagi tuk hay
Kisi ki qabar ke andar zameendaari nahi chalti!
Mana ke raat bohat ho chuki, sonay ka waqt hy
Per kiya keroon qalam se utarne ko khialaat baaqi hain
Is se humara no phir kabhi rabta hoga
Gr hoga to beech zameen-o-aasman ka faasla hoga
Sabar kerne pe aoon to mur ker bhi na daikhon
Tum ne daikha hi nahi abhi mera pathar hona!
Ye jo doobi hain meri aankhain ashkon ke darya main
Ye matti ke insaano per bharosay ki saza hay
Tujhse Moo Kis Tarah Modta..
Pyaar Tera Meri Aur Tha..
Gair Samjha Mujhe Umr Bhar..
Uska Bhi Ek Ajab Daur Tha..
Tujh Ko De Kar Ke Khushiya Sabhi..
Gham Ki Chadar Ko Me Audta..
Ho Na Jaye Kahi Be-Rukhi..
Kis Tarah Me Zuba Kholta..
Teri Yaade Hai Is Shahr Me..
Ye Shahr Kaise Me Chodta..
Dekha Sameer Ne Raat Bhar..
Wo Meri Basti Ka Chor Tha..

bus pehlay jahan dil hota hay ab wahan dard hota hay!
